<Text: The American Stock Exchange Building, formerly known as the New York Curb Exchange Building, is the former headquarters of the American Stock Exchange.>

Triplets:<The American Stock Exchange Building
2:
--------------------
<Text: American Stock Exchange Building:  Built in 1921 and enlarged in 1929-31, the building represents a link to the historical practices of stock trading outside the strictures of the New York Stock Exchange, which took place outside ("on the curb") prior to the construction of this building.>

Triplet:<American Stock Exchange Building
3:
--------------------
Text: American Stock Exchange Building:  It was designated a National Historic Landmark in 1978.
Triplets:<American Stock Exchange Building
4:
--------------------
Text: American Stock Exchange Building:  The building presently stands vacant, the stock exchange having moved out after merging with the NYSE in 2008.

Triplets:<American Stock Exchange Building
